text: atinuśēṣaṁ pinneyuṁ niṅṅaḷuṭe manas's kaṭuttu. ‎at pāṟapēāle kaṭhinamāyi. alla; atiluṁ kūṭutal ‎kaṭuttu. cila pāṟakaḷilninn uṟavakaḷ ‎peāṭṭiyeāḻukāṟuṇṭ. cilat peāṭṭippiḷarnn veḷḷaṁ ‎curattāṟumuṇṭ. daivabhayattāl ‎nilampatikkunnavayumuṇṭ. niṅṅaḷ ‎ceyyunnatinekkuṟicceānnuṁ allāhu aśrad'dhanalla. ‎
